data.title: Helicopters targetable when landed
Tank shells do 100% vs. armor again. Buff turret. MRLS fixed.
data.body:
Tank shells back the way they were, and as they are in RA.
Matched turret stats to RA.
MRLS fix by Bellator. Only 2 rockets but with more damage and more spread. Faster missile.

data.title: Health Trait in wrong location
data.body: Health trait should not be in Game but in RA. Because if you make a mod now there is no way for you to modify MaxHealth in-game without making your own Health trait. That's why the Health trait should be in RA not in Game. I see no reason why it's part of engine anyways...

data.title: FPS drop from mouse movement
data.body:
While trying out the game I noticed the fps was looking pretty clunky, which seemed odd because I should be able to run this game just fine(I run the full game just fine for example), so I opened up the performance information and noticed a LARGE spike in "Render_flip" and "Render" whenever the mouse was moved, but this problem did not occur if I held the left mouse button while moving it, and the game runs just fine as long as I've not moving my mouse.

CPU: AMD Athlon Dual Core 3.1ghz
GPU: Nvidia 8400GS

Mouse Moving
http://img560.imageshack.us/img560/9977/openragame2012051320323.jpg

Mouse Not Moving
http://img833.imageshack.us/img833/387/openragame2012051320322.jpg

_edit_ and if it's important, I'm using windows xp professional 64bit.

_edit2_ Not sure if this is important or not, but when the mouse is moving it causes a large spike in csrss.exe, lowering the cpu usage of OpenRA from 50% down to 20-30%(on that core), just mentioning it, if it's important.

data.title: make scaling occur before pixel doubling
data.body:
(disclaimer: I love scaling, I think it's a great feature). Scaling doesn't work right on low-res (pixel doubling) at the moment. If units are larger and scaled, they look far too high-res compared to their neighbours. 

This is what they look like: http://i.imgur.com/kHuxo.jpg
What it should probably look like: http://i.imgur.com/T9QtK.jpg

Hope you can fix this.
Thanks,

data.title: Website: Add Donate Button
data.body:
Someone in IRC expressed the wish to donate to the project:

[09:19] <Menthu_Rae> eh anyway if anyone sees anyone in charge of the project - let them know they should have a way to donate :)

Maybe add a PayPal or Flattr button.

data.title: Teamkilling issue
data.body:
Recently we have had a player impersonating other legitimate players and teamkilling a few minutes into the game. This has made team matches unplayable. We need a way to prevent this, such as an authentication/account system.
Replay here, teamkiller is the black player up the top. http://dl.dropbox.com/u/8707714/OpenRA-2012-05-12T163426Z.rep

data.title: Spectating host is unable to set AI starting spots
data.body: If the host is a spectator, they are unable to set the starting positions of AI players in the lobby.

data.title: Indicate the host/admins in game lobby
data.body: Sometimes it is not apparent who is hosting the game if the host is spectating, for example. Add a simple indicator to show who is hosting.

data.title: added Renderer Textfield in RA Settings with Description
data.body:
fixes Issue #2052 however I intended to create a dropdown field, but I don't know how to do this as Renderer is a string (why?) and not an enumeration like WindowModes.

I created a new pull-request because the old one was spammed with recent changes that have nothing to do it with it.

data.title: added Renderer Textfield in RA Settings with Description
data.body:
Fixes Issue #2052 however I intended to create a dropdown field, but I don't know how to do this as Renderer is a string (why?) and not an enumeration like WindowModes.

I created a new pull-request because the old one was spammed with recent changes that have nothing to do it with it.

data.title: added UPNP support
data.body:
Known issue: changing the port number won't work, requires port set to 1234 (in-game) and restart, otherwise time-out. Don't know how to fix this. I am probably using a wrong Port variable or the function is misplaced.

I created a new pull-request because the old one was spammed with recent changes that have nothing to do it with it.

data.title: make BACKSPACE key cycle through con. yards
data.body:
I like to hit backspace to center on my con. yard quickly. If I have more than one, I would like to use the same key to view it, too.
Suggestion:
1. Hit Backspace to go to your main con. yard. Hit it again to cycle through the rest of your con. yards. 
2. Backspace should always go to main con. yard first, unless you have hit the backspace key in the last X seconds, in which case it should cycle through, from the previous one. 
3. Key in question should be user-definable in .yaml. (Personally I think it should be set to H key, since that was the default in RA, RA 2 and RA 3.)

Should make sure that if you undeploy/move your original con. yard that it remains the #1 to center on. 

(Personally I don't think that the building needs to be selected, only centered on. )

data.title: make cnc HPAD repair behavior same as FIX
data.body:
HPAD is a bit cumbersome to repair helis with. In CNC it is used as a repair bad for helis. I like this, but there are some issues.

1) HPAD does not allow newly constructed helis spawn while another heli is on the pad repairing. I think they should be able to spawn. 
2) Helis on the repair pad do not go to the rally points when repair is complete. Instead they sit there. 
3) You cannot queue a heli to land for repairs while another one is on the pad. With FIX, you can have queues of units that wait until the previous unit leaves the pad before entering for repairs. It would be nice to have this working for HPAD as well.

Gold star to whoever fixes this!

data.title: allow #comments at end of line in .yaml
data.body:
Currently in .yaml you can only put comments on single lines. 
I would like .yaml to allow comments  after data has been entered. Like this:

Key:
        Value: string                                     # comment that doesn't fuck shit up by being there

Please and thank you.

data.title: CNC - Capturing second command center gives wrong build options
data.body:
Reproduction steps:
1) Start classic CNC game as GDI against a GDI opponent
2) Capture opponents command center with engineer
3) New Build Queue is added but has NOD buildings of which only the power plant can ever be built

Build 20120504 on Win 7 SP1 x64

data.title: Cancel orders after Chronosphere teleports units back
data.body: Units should have their orders cancelled after the Chronosphere teleports units back to their original position. As it is now, units will attempt to drive back across the map to attack the unit they were just attacking, requiring the player to cancel their orders manually.

data.title: ground units cannot hit landed helicopters
data.body:
When a Chinook is on the ground, ground units cannot target it.

But anti-air weapons still can.  So, the SAM site is still shooting at it even though it's on the ground. That shouldn't be. 

Perhaps ideally they would switch from being an air unit into a ground unit half way during the landing process.

data.title: Add separate "aims" for different elevations
data.body:
One aim for when the unit is engaging air units and another for when it is engaging ground units.
## <bountysource-plugin>

Want to back this issue? **[Post a bounty on it!](https://www.bountysource.com/issues/98267-add-separate-aims-for-different-elevations?utm_campaign=plugin&utm_content=tracker%2F36085&utm_medium=issues&utm_source=github)** We accept bounties via [Bountysource](https://www.bountysource.com/?utm_campaign=plugin&utm_content=tracker%2F36085&utm_medium=issues&utm_source=github).
</bountysource-plugin>

data.title: anti-lag indicator in lobby
data.body: When people join a game they should display ping/bandwidth or anything that is a good indicator whether the game will be laggy so they can leave or get kicked. Choosing a country/flag as your profile (maybe auto-detected) might be also a good indicator if the game will be playable.

data.title: 2 Yaks on the same AFLD
data.body:
Version release_2012-0504

http://files.lv-vl.net/bugs/2yaks1afld.png

data.title: added Renderer Textfield in RA Settings with Description
data.body: fixes Issue #2052 however I intended to create a dropdown field, but I don't know how to do this as Renderer is a string (why?) and not an enumeration like WindowModes.

data.title: Cashticks
data.body:
Fixed bug in cash ticks, normal settings: no sound was heard when repairing buildings or on low power.
Fixed.

data.title: Repair barrack is free.
data.body:
Repairing a barrack costs no money.
Repairing other kinds of buildings (checked power plant and navel yard) do cost money.

data.title: Fix useless error message when providing a field twice in yaml
data.body:
If the same block defines a field twice, the yaml loader crashes with a non-obvious error message.

Example where this was broken is in cnc's weapons.yaml -- ArtilleryShell ended up with ContrailLength specified twice.
